projects.name: LibCity
projects.description: A unified, comprehensive library for reproducing and developing spatial-temporal prediction methods, facilitating research and application in urban computing.

projects.name: TorchSpatiotemporal
projects.description: A PyTorch library for spatiotemporal sequence modeling, providing implementations of various spatiotemporal models.

projects.name: MovingPandas
projects.description: Processing and visualization of movement data based on GeoPandas, providing trajectory analytics capabilities.

projects.name: GeoPandas
projects.description: Python library that extends pandas to allow spatial operations on geometric types, widely used for geospatial ML.

projects.name: PySAL
projects.description: Python Spatial Analysis Library, providing tools for spatial data analysis and modeling.

projects.name: GRASS GIS
projects.description: A powerful open-source geospatial processing engine that supports advanced modeling, time series analysis, and spatial data management with comprehensive spatiotemporal capabilities.

projects.name: PostGIS
projects.description: Spatial database extender for PostgreSQL that supports temporal dimensions and spatiotemporal queries with robust indexing capabilities.

projects.name: GeoServer
projects.description: Open source server for sharing geospatial data that provides spatiotemporal data services and dynamic map creation with time-enabled layers.

projects.name: GDAL/OGR
projects.description: Geospatial data abstraction library supporting spatiotemporal data formats and transformations with extensive format support.

projects.name: QGIS
projects.description: Leading open source GIS desktop software with plugins supporting spatiotemporal analysis and visualization of time-series data.

projects.name: Open Data Cube
projects.description: System for analyzing Earth observation data designed specifically for spatiotemporal data cubes and time-series analysis.

projects.name: MobilityDB
projects.description: Open source extension to PostgreSQL for managing and analyzing trajectory data and moving objects with advanced spatiotemporal queries.

projects.name: rasdaman
projects.description: Array database for managing and analyzing multi-dimensional raster data including spatiotemporal data cubes.

projects.name: Orfeo ToolBox
projects.description: Remote sensing image processing library with time series analysis capabilities for spatiotemporal earth observation data.

projects.name: TorchGeo
projects.description: Deep learning library for geospatial data with specific support for spatiotemporal remote sensing datasets.

projects.name: actinia
projects.description: REST API for GRASS GIS providing cloud-based spatiotemporal analysis capabilities and processing services.

projects.name: GeoTools
projects.description: Java geospatial toolkit with spatiotemporal data processing capabilities and OGC standard implementations.
